name: Prohibition
description:
Use the WASD keys to move, mouse to look around.

To interact with the puzzle in the basement simply move close to the pieces and left click on them.

This was a game made in two weeks for a college project about stealth learning games, games which are about 20% educational and 80% entertainment. This was targeted towards middle school curriculum in which the Prohibition Era in America is taught.

This game was made in about 2 weeks with three other people in unity. I myself was responsible for the level design, sound, and overall feel of the game.

NOTE - This was not originally built for web, so when you click on the quit button the game will simply freeze.

Assets Used

For weather effects - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/enviro-sky-and-weather-33963

For wood textures - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/wood/high-quality-realistic-wood-textures-mega-pack-75831

Jazz music - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music-collection-37351
